avalancheActivity.highlights: Low avalanche danger will prevail. A little snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.comment: The old wind slabs are mostly small and can only be released in isolated cases. Individual avalanche prone locations for dry avalanches are to be found in particular on very steep shady slopes at elevated altitudes, in particular in gullies and bowls. Such avalanche prone locations are rare and are easy to recognise. Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs are now only very rarely prone to triggering. Weak layers exist deep in the snowpack on shady slopes.
A little snow is lying. The snowpack will be subject to considerable local variations. Little snow has fallen in some localities.

tendency.highlights: In all altitude zones from a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying. Low avalanche danger will prevail.
